raw_body: Retired senior superintendent of police, at rest with Jesus. Beloved husband of Marny, (nee Setunga), much loved father of Eshan and Sonali, brother-in-law of Myrna Setunga, father-in-law of Preethi and Niranjan, grandfather of Priyesh, Amrita, Yehath and Sasha, brother and brother-in-law of the late Doreen and Shelton, the late Malini and Hiran, the late Ayra and of Derrick, Savithri and Gordon, Sunethra and the late Kingsley, Shirani and the la
